data.name: Warframe: Khora Prime Access - Venari Pack
data.detailed_description:
For more Prime Access Bundle options, click here.

VENARI PACK
  • 2625 Platinum
  • KHORA PRIME: A harmony of mistress and monster. The gilded huntress and her loyal Kavat, Venari, dominate the battlefield with their will.
  • VENARI PRIME: Khora’s will, Venari’s fangs and claws.
  • HYSTRIX PRIME: Versatile weapons complement deadly hunters. Khora Prime’s signature pistol rotates through hot, cold, electric, and toxic quills. When equipped on Khora, Hystrix Prime has a chance to instantly reload after headshots.
  • DUAL KERES PRIME: The hunted will meet a quick end when faced with Khora Prime's signature swords. Heavy Attack Efficiency is enhanced when wielded by Khora.
  • Exclusive Khora Prime Glyphs

Prime Warframes and Weapons in Prime Access can also be crafted from parts found in Relics in-game.

Note: This pack can only be purchased as part of a bundle.

data.short_description: Make the newest Prime Warframe and Weapons yours instantly. The Venari Pack includes 2625 Platinum, Khora Prime, Hystrix Prime, Dual Keres Prime and exclusive Khora Prime Glyphs.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Video:DirectX 11+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:35 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.
